name: Querying with Transact-SQL
tagline: Learn how to query SQL Server databases
body:
![Querying with Transact-SQL]
(https://www.edx.org/sites/default/files/styles/course_video_banner/public/course/image/featured-card/dat201x_thumbnail.jpg)

***

Transact-SQL is an essential skill for database professionals and developers working with SQL databases. This course takes you from your first SELECT statement to implementing transactional programmatic logic through a combination of expert instruction, demonstrations, and practical labs. Sign up for this free course on [edX](https://www.edx.org/course/querying-transact-sql-microsoft-dat201x-0) or [Microsoft Virtual Academy](https://mva.microsoft.com/en-US/training-courses/querying-with-transact-sql-10530).

[Slides](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/QueryingT-SQL/tree/master/Slides)

[Demonstrations](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/QueryingT-SQL/tree/master/Demos)

[Labs](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/QueryingT-SQL/tree/master/Labs)
